group_1.textLeft: When they said they would help me, there was@no turning back…
It'll be even worse if I run away now.
In retrospect, that was a really crummy joke@to begin with…

group_1.textRight: How so?

group_1.textLeft: If I confess to him just because I lost the game…
It'll feel insincere somehow.
Both to him and to my friends who are always@advising me…

group_1.textRight: Then why don't you just confess?

group_1.textLeft: Because it's…embarassiiiiing… But I want to be@held accountable to what I said…

group_1.textRight: …You're contradicting yourself.

group_1.textLeft: Aw, c'mon, Takina! You just don't understand@how a girl's heart works.

group_1.textRight: That's not true!@I can understand THAT much!

group_1.textLeft: You're just saying that…

group_1.textRight: …So erm…Aimi, was it?@What do you want to do?
The most important thing here is what@YOU want!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…I want to be honest with my feelings@and my friends…
I'm just not ready to confess my feelings yet…
So what I want is…I want someone to team up@with me to fight Kokoro and Masara in that game!
Then, if they win…and if I'm ready…@I'll confess to him!

group_1.textRight: Alrighty! Leave it to me!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you SO much!

group_1.textRight: What's the point in fighting if she's not going@to advance…?

group_1.textLeft: Fighting to keep going IS advancing, though.
Oh yeah, that VR game is a two-versus-two@shooting match, right?
Yep, sure is!
I've heard it's hard because you have to dodge@and avoid the enemies yourself.

group_1.textRight: Shooters, huh…@I'm not really into that sorta thing…
And I'm all about hand-to-hand combat@myself…

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh heh…@Then this is where Takina and I shine!

group_1.textRight: Well… I suppose if it's marksmanship that@you're after…
I have played such video games in the past.
Ooh, you guys sound like pros! C'mon, let's all@head over to the arcade together!
…Oh! Shoot!

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Something wrong, Emily?

group_1.textRight: Sorry, you guys… I just remembered something@really important…
I completely forgot to do my homework@for tomorrow!

group_1.textLeft: No worries!@I think we've got this under control!

group_1.textRight: Like, seriously, I'm sorry about this!
Here, lemme give you this map!@It'll show you the way to Mikazuki Villa!

group_1.textLeft: This is some map!

group_1.textRight: We get tourists and people who are lost@all the time.
So I made a rough map of the whole city@of Kamihama to give out!

group_1.textLeft: It's so cute! And hand-drawn, too!@Thanks so much!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* It's all good, then!@Alright, you're with me, Akiracchi!
What? Me?!

group_1.textLeft: Yep! There's NO way I'm finishing my homework@all by myself!
Okay, see you guys later!

group_1.textRight: Until next time.

group_1.textLeft: Off we go, then!@Time to march into battle!

group_1.textRight: Woo!
